subject: Dear owner,
body:
Dear owner,
I am Mr David Lewis, Inspection Unit Manager United Nations
Inspection Agency in Hartsfield Jackson International Airport Atlanta,
Georgia. During our investigation, I discovered An abandoned shipment
through a Diplomat from the United Kingdom which was transferred from
JF Kennedy Airport to our facility here in Atlanta.
The two consignment boxes are worth $10 million. And I assure you that
the consignment is in your name, and you are advised to provide all
details for claim, after custom clearance charges are perfected .
(REPLY TO THIS EMAIL : (
davidlewis0157@gmail.com
)with reconfirmation
of your Full Name, Home
Address, City, State and Telephone number.
Best Regards,
Mr. David Lewis
Head Officer-in-Charge

subject: Re:   Dear owner,
body:
Dear Mr. David Lewis,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the abandoned shipment at Hartsfield Jackson Airport in Atlanta. I appreciate you bringing this to my attention. Could you please provide me with more information about the contents of the two boxes? It would be helpful to know what exactly is inside before proceeding with any further steps.

Additionally, could you clarify what you mean by "custom clearance charges"? Are there any fees or payments that need to be made in order to claim the shipment? I just want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the process.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: THE TRUTH ABOUT YOUR SHIPMENT FUND TO Thomas
body:
Harts-field-Jackson International Airport
6000 N Terminal Pkwy,
Atlanta, Georgia.30320, USA
Telephone: +14708510283

Attention: Beneficiary : Thomas

I wish to acknowledge the receipt of your email is well noted and
 concerning the shipment of your consignment Trunk boxes worth of
$10Million Dollars which has scheduled for shipment and has been
facilitated By United Nations payment Auditors as instructed By United The
States Delivery Authority since the trunk boxes have been in our facility
for a very long time. But be informed that we have concluded with
management and the United Nations office here in Atlanta Georgia and it has
been finalized that consignment will  be released and shipped to you, but
the trunk boxes must be cleared from customs and IRS before a proper
shipment process will take place.

Henceforth you are advised to pay for the Clearance and Yellow tags fee of
$550 only and I will send you the details you will use to send the fee and
 the shipment process will take effect immediately without
any delay or more fees. Kindly advise that this is 100% legitimate
approved by the United States Government.

TakeNote: And  that  is your Civil responsibility to take care of the cost
for the Procurement    they can't deduct any amount of your fund because
your consignment fund is under insurance policy  which nobody have access
to it until  it been delivery to you because is under  the Airport
authority and customs and   without  the  Clearance and Yellow tags  Non
Inspection Clearance certificate    the consignment fund can"t leave the to
your country.

However, This Transaction is not a Pressure or Force on you rather it is a
personal decision so I wish to advise you as the Procurement Agent,
Considering my experiences in securing similar Certificate for other
beneficiaries to be Focused and watch out the Result beside the Total
procurement Cost which is $550 can not make you rich Nor Poor, Knowing that
it is better to hope for Something than not to be hopeful on anything.

 The fund is with airport authority without  the  Clearance and Yellow tags
 Non Inspection Clearance certificate   i will give you account details
 you can use to send it   via cash deposit  to bank  account that i will
give you  or bank to bank wire transfer  because i want the deliver agent
to leave to your house address by Monday with consignment Trunk boxes worth
of $10Million Dollars

As soon as i hear back from you i  will send you   delivery agent
information that you can send the fee via western union  money gram
Walmart to Walmart  or RIA  transfer

Full name:Jerry Oliver
State:Minnesota
City:Engle Bend
Zip code:56446
Country:USA

Moreover, the consignments were declared as personal effects and
classified documents while in actual fact contain raw cash, US
currency notes in $100USD denominations carefully packed and stashed in two
trunk boxes. Approximately, 5Million USD in each box. The
electronic scanner revealed it when the package was scanned in JFK in
New York before it was shipped to Atlanta, and the shipment will be
released immediately the clearance is done, so you are advised to pay
the clearance and inspection charges ASAP to enable the shipment
facilitation immediately.
Best Regards,
Mr. David Lewis
Head Officer-in-Charge

subject: Re: THE TRUTH ABOUT YOUR SHIPMENT FUND TO Thomas
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate the update regarding the shipment of the trunk boxes. Could you please provide more details about the clearance and yellow tags fee that needs to be paid for the proper shipment process? I want to make sure everything is in order before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Thomas
